t: AMAZON LOOKING TO FILL 1,800 NEW POSITIONS IN PORTLAND
s: September 14, 2020 - Amazon announced Monday that it will hire 100,000 positions across their operations network, and 1,800 of those jobs will be coming to Portland. Amazon already has more than 9,000 jobs already existing in Oregon, so the additional jobs will be a substantial increase to its work force in the state.
